ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This class will teach you how to read and write using the Persian alphabet. You'll learn basic grammar (present and past tense, verb conjugation, etc.) and many useful vocabulary words, far beyond the small lists in the textbook. There's also a cultural component to the course, where we discussed Iran's religions, ethnic groups, history, geography, holidays, etc. I would recommend this course to any student who is willing to work hard and really wants to learn Persian.
I would definitely recommend this class for anyone who wants to learn Farsi.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I had limited knowledge of Persian before this course, so it taught me many of the basics and made me feel much more comfortable using the language for simple tasks.
